name: Potionboy
description:
Your health potential is your damage potential — defeat enemies by crashing against them, or consume some of your life-force for an explosive area attack 

Like Potionboy? Join our Discord here

WASD or Arrow Keys to hop around

Left Mouse Button to dash

Right Mouse Button to use your potion

Your health can be seen as the potion inside of the bottle

Health regenerates every 5 seconds

Defeat the enemies and don't die

M to mute music and G to disable shaking

Art, code, design, and music by Felix Liu

Art and design by Jacky Wei
